subject: Second Vaccination and Questionnaire
message:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Your vaccination date for the second vaccination is the 15.7.2020. at 10:00-11:00. In the email is a questionnaire attached. Please fill it out in order for us to approve our service. The questionnaire is anonymous and all the data is being handled through strict GDPR guidelines. Thank you in advance and stay safe!

Kind regards,

GetShot team
